name: 2023 14th International Conference on E-Education, E-Business, E-Management and E-Learning (IC4E 2023)
content: Conference Proceedings: IC4E welcomes the submissions from on innovative work from researchers in work from researchers in academic, industry and government describing original research work in E-Education, E-Business, E-Management and E-Learning. Accepted excellent papers by IC4E 2023 will be published in the conference proccedings, which will be collected in the conference proceedings, and then indexed by Ei Compendex, and Scopus, etc. major databases. Journal Publication: Option 1: International Journal of Trade, Economics and Finance (IJTEF), which will be indexed by ProQuest, Crossref, Electronic Journals Library , EBSCO, and Ulrich's Periodicals Directory. ISSN: 2010-023X (Print) Frequency: Bimonthly DOI: 10.18178/IJTEF template: http://www.ic4e.net/IJTEF\_template.doc Option 2: International Journal of Information and Education Technology (IJIET), which will be indexed by Scopus (CiteScore 2021: 1.3), INSPEC (IET), UGC-CARE List (India), CNKI, EBSCO, Electronic Journals Library, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc. ISSN: 2010-3689 (Online) Abbreviated Title: Int. J. Inf. Educ. Technol. Frequency: Monthly DOI: 10.18178/IJIET Template: http://www.ijiet.org/files/IJIET\_template.doc
